turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how are you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm doing great. How are you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm okay and ready to help.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All righty, then. I need help placing an order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what kind of order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to place an order for pizza from a new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I can do that. How many pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size did you want ?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like them all to be size large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, now let's do the toppings.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okie dokie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, on the first one, I would like it to be.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A chicken barbeque pizza.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: But, I don't want additional toppings added to it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: For additional toppings, I would like with extra bacon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: green pepper, mushrooms, and double black olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, it's 50 cents for extra toppings, 3 dollars for extra protein.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's no problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you repeat that so I know I have it correctly?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's see. I would like a chicken barbecue pizza, but I would like to add these extra toppings. And I'm okay with extra charge. I would like to have bacon added, green pepper added, and double black olives added. Oh, and mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Now what would you like for the second one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The second, I want that one to be a First off, triple cheese. Not just double but triple cheese. And I would like that to not have any meat on it. I would want it to be mushrooms, green peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Tomatoes, if that's available. Also, black olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What else sounds good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: end.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Spinach. It's a habit.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll check.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do have spinach!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. That's what I want on my second pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright let's do number 3 next.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okie doke. On the third pizza, I would like that to be.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Light cheese, extra sauce, I would like it to have double bacon I would like it to have beef pepperoni and double pepperoni and ham if they have that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright and what did you want for your last one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My last one, I would like that to be a.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: double cheese pizza Do they offer a second type of cheese to add to their pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Like a cheddar provolone or Parmesan. Are any of those available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: mozzerella and provolone are available. You can also get feta.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that's great. Well, I would like that to be a double cheese from the mozzarella and put along, and then also a double fretta yummy.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have 4 large pizzas, a chicken bbq with bacon, double olives, green pepper,and mushrooms. Triple Cheese, no meat, green peppers and mushrooms, tomatoes, black olives, and spinach for the second one. The third one has Light cheese and extra sauce, it's a meatlovers with double pepperoni and finally a double mozzerella, provolone, and double feta pizza. Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct, but I need all four pizzas to be a size large and it's important that they all four of them have a gluten-free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you mind repeating it all back to me again one more time? Just to make sure that we got it right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So I have 4 large gluten free pizzas, a chicken bbq with bacon, double olives, green pepper,and mushrooms. Triple Cheese, no meat, green peppers and mushrooms, tomatoes, black olives, and spinach for the second one. The third one has Light cheese and extra sauce, it's a meatlovers with double pepperoni, and finally, a double mozzerella, provolone, and double feta pizza. Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that sounds perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. It'll be $94.85.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll send you the reciept via text and you'll be able to pick them up in 45 minutes okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okie dokie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. Enjoy your pizzas and have a good day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much. You too.Bye-bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye!
